name: bnsca

stmt.origin: simp3bi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms))
stmt.pretty: simp3bi(c0 ∈ Ban, c1 ∈ CMetSp, c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ CMetSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, ccms))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c1 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, ccms))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c1 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp))
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, ccms))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))

comment: The scalar field of a Banach space is complete. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
